sentences.english: Article 66 The trustee of a public trust must not resign without the approval of the regulatory agency of public undertakings.

sentences.english: Nonprofits could use it to livestream video from events.

sentences.english: Perhaps a nonprofit could use your technical skills.

sentences.english: The lawsuit of the public benefit is becoming a brand-new hot topic in both jurisdiction and law.

sentences.english: Like the law, censorship contributes to the common good .
sentences.chinese: 同法律一樣，審查制給社會公益帶來好處。

sentences.english: He sits on the board of several other non-profit organizations.

sentences.english: Why does the author think that the idea of the common good is important in this passage?
sentences.chinese: 在這篇文章中作者爲什麼認爲社會公益心非常重要？

sentences.english: In 2011 his work "Honest Election" wins the honorable mention.
sentences.chinese: 2011年創作的《廉潔選舉》公益廣告獲得優秀獎。

sentences.english: These advertisements have helped to increase public knowledge.

sentences.english: Arcola is a Title One school, which means it serves a large population of students from low-income families.
